Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerMarried: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/OldMarinerName}}: Glad the amulet worked out for ye, {0}.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/OldMarinerName}}: Don't be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one you intend to marry.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/OldMarinerName}}: I can see that sparkle in yer eye, {0}. Ye must be head over heels in love. But I'm afraid a bigger house is essential for a happy marriage.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/OldMarinerName}}: Ah, I can see it in yer eyes... There be a special someone in yer heart. Just so happens I'm sellin' a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Give that to yer intended and they'll know exactly what you mean.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNoRelationship: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/OldMarinerName}}: I've got this old amulet to sell... but somethin' tells me yer not ready for it, {0}.
Entries.Bus_NoDriver: You'll have to wait until {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}'s on duty to ride the bus.
Entries.Desert_SandDragon_MrQiNote: 'You've proven yourself, kid. Check out the pile of lumber next to your house. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'
Entries.Railroad_Box_MrQiNote: 'Well done. Your next task: Place 10 beets inside Mayor's fridge. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'
Entries.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_MrQiNote: 'Good job, kid. Your final task: Give the sand dragon his last meal. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'
Entries.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_MrQiNote: 'Your first task: Bring a rainbow shell to the train platform. Leave it in the box. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'
Entries.SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}} cleans {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} trash bin regularly.
Entries.ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}'s place for aerobics club.

-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...What's that? You want to build {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} a house? That's a great idea!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...
Entries.Town_SeedShopSign:
- {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s General Store -
Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm!
Entries.Town_PickupTruck: It's just the back of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}' old pickup truck...
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled_Krobus: You've changed your mind about kicking {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusName}} out.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed_Krobus: You've decided to kick {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusName}} out of the house. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Entries.Caroline_Sunroom_Door: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}} only lets her friends enter here...
